1.content:
Alright here are five sets of people for you to choose from. But it is up to you to define their personalities, and what personality traits they have that they need to work on.

Okay I know it is a little abstract but think of it like this, if the character is cocky what kind of transformation would change that, or if a character has self confidence issues what kind of transformation would help that?
1.title: Roommates

11.content:
After a long day at work, James had finally made it home. However, as he opens the door, he is greeted by garbage bags, a sink full of dishes, and his roommate Aaron watching TV on the couch.

“Hey man what’s up?” Aaron says from the couch.

“Ah hey…” he says still looking at the dishes. “Yea, could you toss me that big of chips on the counter?” he says crumbling the bag he had just finished and tossing it behind him.

James then takes a deep breath and walks toward the counter, “Hey isn’t it your week to do the dishes?” he says quietly tossing the bag to him.

Aaron catches the bag, “Thanks, ah yeah don’t worry I’ve got it, just waiting for the sink to fill up.” He says opening the bag.

“Well you’ve already got some cups and plates on the counter beside the sink…” James says.

But Aaron just continued watching TV, “Sorry man games back.” He says turning up the TV.

James then takes another deep breath and walks to his room but before he opens the door, he pauses.

“Oh yeah and it’s the first Friday of the month so…” he says, and with that Aaron mutes the TV and gets up off the couch.

“Ah yeah about that, you see my hours have been crazy lately, so any chance I could get a few more days on my half, a week tops?” he asks knowing that James has covered his share of the rent before.

“Ah I don’t know, my hours have been pretty unstable too and you already owe me last week so…” James says.

“I know but just one more month. You know I’m good for it.” He says smiling desperately

“Ah okay, just one more time...” James says.

“You are the greatest my friend!” Aaron says smiling.

Aaron then happily returns to the couch and James heads to his room.

"Oh boy, he can barely take care of anything" muttered James as he closed the door to his room.

(How is it going to happen?)
11.title: James and Aaron

111.content:
The next morning James was groggy as the sun shined in through his window. He remembered the stressful time he had with Aaron's inability to hold up to anything he agreed to. Sighing to himself, he got himself ready for the day. He worked a part-time job at a Starbucks just down the street.

Unfortunately, he had a bit of a rude awakening when he tripped on an empty bag on chips as he entered the living room of the apartment. Aaron was still lazily sitting on the couch. Stretching out some of the aches from the fall, James slightly limped over to Aaron.

"Seriously? You couldn't at least pick up the empty bags? You're acting like this is a garbage dump" said James, trying to be as stern as he could without yelling. Aaron nonchalantly looked back.

"Don’t worry I’ll straighten things up later, but if it really bothers you just throw it away." he replied, turning back to the TV. James could take a lot of crud from Aaron, but he was really pushing his boundaries now.

"Of course, As usual I throw away your crap. You're lucky you live here with me. You can't do anything by yourself" said James. That got Aaron's attention as he stood up.

"You sound just like my mother,” Aaron says laughing, “And I would be just fine without you." He says, "I doubt it." James replied.

The argument went back and forth after that, slowly rising in noise level as it did. Aaron threatened to really leave, but James doubted it. Even Aaron knew that he didn't have the income to live on his own for real.

As the time went on, James needed to get to work. With one last remark, he slammed the door behind him, still limping a bit from his fall from earlier.

Needless to say, things didn't improve that day. That argument stayed on James' mind and he was irritable all day. It caused him some trouble at his job when he acted a little harshly to some fellow employees. The only good thing out of this was that he only got a warning because he was generally a hard and generous worker.

Late afternoon came by, and James was walking home.

"Great, a totally cruddy day, and I still have Aaron to deal with when I get back" he sighed to himself.

James was so stressed that he didn’t look where he was going and bumped into an old man in front of him.

“Oh I’m so sorry!” James says.

“Well that is quiet alright my friend. I get bumped into all the time in this city, though it is nice to get an apology.” The man says laughing as he straightens himself up.

Upon closer inspection, James notices the multiple layers of mismatched clothes. He instantly knew the man was homeless but didn’t say anything.

“Ah. Yeah people can be pretty rude these days.” James says trying not to give any indication that he knew the man was homeless. “So where you headed?” James asks the man.

“The park, or maybe the bridge on 5th and Jefferson.” He says cheerfully.

“Ah that’s… nice.” He says.

“It’s okay to talk about it son, times are hard these days.” He says smiling. “But enough about me, I’ve been around long enough to know when a man has something on his mind. Care to talk about it?” he says

“Oh it’s nothing, just my life.” James says.

“Well that can’t be so bad. I see you’ve got a job, and I’m guessing a roof over your head, and maybe a girlfriend?” he says smiling.

James smiles at that. “Well two for three isn’t bad. I’ve never been really good with women, or most people for that matter.” He says depressingly

“Oh come on, you’re a good guy with a big heart.” He says placing his hand on James’ shoulder.

“Thanks, but as far back as I can remember people haven’t really been interested in that.” He says

“Well it sounds to me like you are too concerned with the physical. That problem is taking its toll on your spirit. Try looking at life from a new perceptive and see what you find.” The old man says. James really didn’t understand anything he had said about the physical or spirit but he felt sudden warmth in his heart when he heard it. He tried his best to downplay it though. He would be incredibly embarrassed if anyone else knew that.

“Well I’m headed this way,” the man says walking away.

“Ah hey thanks for listening, and ah... I know it’s not much but...” James says, reaching for his wallet. However, the old man just smiled and gestured for him to put the money away.

“It was my pleasure. I’ll see you around.” He says as he vanished into the night.

James continued home to find the same mess he had left that morning and Aaron passed out on the couch. He was still annoyed but thanks to the old man’s words found it easier shrug it off and call it a night.

"I don't know what that old man did, but maybe talking about it relieved me a bit" James said to himself with a smile as he closed the door to his room.
111.title: Magic

1112.content:
Later that night James went to bed as usual, thinking about his day. He supposed that it could have been worse. At least that old man was really nice. James couldn't help but think of the weirder part of his words though.

"Meh, who knows what he was talking about," He grumbled to himself.

A few hours later, as James was out like a light, his digital clock struck midnight.

Suddenly, what felt like fire seemed to be born inside of him. At first, the conscious part of his brain thought nothing of it and continued sleeping. However, after about 15 minutes, the fire seemed to blossom, as if it was intensifying and spreading inside of him. James hadn't felt like this since he got the flu when he was 10.

Waking up from his sleep and breathing heavily, James slowly got himself out of bed, walking towards the bathroom, which wasn't exactly easy, he made it inside. He was thankful that there was a bathroom connected to his bedroom.

James poured himself some water and drunk it down heartily. That seemed to help somewhat, although the feeling of illness was still there.

"(cough) Maybe I worked too hard or something." muttered James.

He didn't feel like throwing up, as he was thankful for that. Part of him did wonder though how something like that would flare up so fast like that. Well, James was no medical expert, so he would just have to wait until morning and see what happens.

As he went back to bed, he had no idea as to what other things happened to him, masked under the heat and fever.

The next morning was a completely different story, if anything he felt better than he had in years, as he walked to the bathroom he began to think that the flu like symptoms were nothing but a bad dream, until he noticed something was off about his walk. And as unusual as it sounded in his head it felt as though something was missing. But he decided he just slept wrong and he just needed to stretch his legs.

As he makes it to the bathroom he takes off his shirt and starts the shower. But as he looked down at his pants he couldn’t help but notice that something seemed different. So he began to remove his underwear only to reveal that something very important was indeed missing!

“W-What the heck?!” James exclaims as his hands went straight to his groin. Where there was supposed to be something was instead nothing. What marked him as a man was gone. All there was a small slit that James could identify from his high school health class.

“W-Why did this happen? No! How did this happen?” asked the frightened young adult. “But when?! Wait! The random flu, was it gone before or after?!” James tries to remember but his head was so messed up that he couldn’t quite think clearly. How in the world could he explain having new “womanhood"?
1112.title: During the Night

11121.content:
James was speechless and dazed from what had just occurred. The loss of his manhood would shock anyone. However, he didn't get a lot of time to think about it, because the silence was suddenly broken by a knock on his door.

“Hey James! Are you alright in there?” Aaron asks from outside the room, likely having heard the commotion.

Now under normal circumstances, James would probably have just said everything was fine and Aaron would have just gone back to his room. But given the shock of losing a man’s most important appendage, still in shock, James slowly staggered to the door. He then opens the door with a pale expression on his face and simply said, “It’s gone…”

In response, Aaron looked at him like he was crazy. James didn’t really look like he wanted to talk about it but to break the silence Aaron responded.

“Wait, what’s gone?” he asked with a concerned look on his face for once.

“My.... ah…” James stuttered, having trouble finding the words. Though, he did gesture between his legs.

Aaron was confused since, for starters James did not look like he was joking and even if he did this wasn’t his kind of joke.

“Wait. Are you saying you don’t have any balls?” Aaron asked. James reluctantly nodded his head in agreement; somewhat embarrassed by the way Aaron phrased it.
Aaron then busted out laughing, “Wow nice man! I needed a good laugh” said Aaron, thinking it was all a joke.

As Aaron turned around to go back to his room, still laughing to himself, James finally snapped out of his shock in reaction to Aaron’s stupid insensitive response to this very serious situation.

"Get over here!" said James, a little more forceful than he usually talked.

He walked up to Aaron, turning him back around, and lowering his pajama pants to show him what was wrong. This act, for obvious reasons, embarrassed James even more, but he hoped that Aaron would eventually get serious about this.

“HOLY SHIT! What the hell is that?!” exclaimed Aaron, jumping back in shock.

“What does it look like?!” James asked rhetorically, pulling his pants back up before his face could become any more red.

“And that’s a recent thing, right?” Aaron asked in his classic immature response to a serious situation.

James rolled his eyes in exasperation. “Aaron! This is not the time for jokes!” James almost shouted. For once, he needed Aaron to be serious.

“Hey I’m sorry. It's just stuff like this doesn’t happen.” said Aaron.

“I know! However, as you can see, I’m missing something pretty important, and I have something I definitely shouldn’t have!” said James in an almost louder voice.

Suddenly, Aaron noticed something else that was different about James.
11121.title: Aaron hears the commotion

111211.content:
As James paces back and forth trying to figure out what to do, Aaron looks him up and down and notices something else is off.

“Hey wait. Stand still for a sec.” said Aaron. James then paused and looked straight at him. “Did you shave this morning?” Aaron continued.

“No. Why?” James asks, raising his hands to his face. James runs his hands over his chin, cheeks, and neck. A baffled look took over his face. He hadn’t shaved in a few days but there wasn’t a single hair on his face!

“Okay man, this is getting weird. Look at your arms.” Aaron said, holding up his own to show him that men traditionally have hair on their forearms. James then quickly looked them over. To his surprise, they were both hairless. He then quickly lifted up his shirt and, as he feared, it too was hairless as well.

“Okay, you can cut it out man.” Aaron said.

“Cut what out!? Do you think I’d shave my entire body and somehow hide my… ah!” James replied, annoyed that Aaron would think he would joke about something like this.

“Okay, let’s take a deep breath here. When was the last time you had… everything?” Aaron asked. James pauses to think back.

“Well, I went to the bathroom last night before bed and everything was fine. Then I felt sick and…” James said, pausing to think for a minute.

“Wait, you’re sick?” Aaron asked.

“Well I was sick last night, but I felt fine this morning.” James replied.

“So wait. What kind of sick?” Aaron asked.

“Well it felt kind of like the flu.” said James.

“And you feel fine now?” Aaron asked.

“Yeah, In fact, until I noticed all this, I felt great this morning.” James said.

“Well then, it can’t be the flu. That normally lasts about a week. I’ve heard of a twenty-four bug but nothing that comes and goes that fast and leave you feeling better after.” Aaron said, actually somewhat serious for once.

“I know. It doesn’t make any since but it happened.” James said defensively.

“Hey calm down, none of this makes any since.” replied Aaron.

James then laid down on the couch. “Okay so the majority of your body hair is gone, and your ah… manhood is missing?” Aaron asked to clarify.

James closed his eyes and took a deep breath. “Yeah, the hair part yes, but the other part isn’t just missing. It was replaced.” He said, embarrassed to be saying it out loud.

“Well what are you going to do?” Aaron asked.

“I don’t know!” James yelled in frustration.

“Wow chill man, that’s not helping anything.” Aaron said. James calmed down somewhat, but Aaron's attitude did still annoy him a little bit.
111211.title: Loss of Body Hair

1112111.content:
"You're a little too nonchalant about this" said James, squinting his eyes at Aaron. Aaron just shrugged.

"I’m sorry but even though it’s weird, it’s kind of funny." Aaron says smiling.

"You're impossible sometimes..." James trailed off, feeling a bit of pressure forming inside his body. At first, he almost felt like something was going to explode out of him. However, he soon realized that it felt more like a compression than anything else.

“Hey man, are you alright?!” Aaron exclaims

"What is...” said James before stopping as he looked forward. Before, he and Aaron were at about the same height. Now, Aaron seemed to be slowly inching upwards, and the room began to slowly look a little bigger. James looked down, seeing the floor come closer to him bit by tiny bit.

When the pressure inside him stopped, James was hardly close to his and Aaron's height of 5'11. Now, he was much closer to 5'4.

The two of them were speechless, as though everything else wasn’t weird enough. Aaron slowly walked toward James, circling around him while looking down at him.

“Ah, what exactly just happened?” Aaron asked.

“Don’t look at me!” James exclaimed, still having to get used to being over half a foot shorter then he was used to.

“Well it’s kind of hard not to look when you just shrank right before my eyes.” He said.

“I know but you’re not helping!” James said back in frustration.

James then walked around the room, familiarizing himself with how everything looked from his new height.

“You know, these are some pretty random changes” said Aaron. James then looked over at him.

“Yeah, what’s your point?” James asked.

“Okay now hear me out. Since this is far from normal, I'd say it's reasonable to ask. Are they really just random or could you be… turning into something…” he asked.

"Don't say it! I don't want to hear it!" James almost yelled.

“Hey man, I’m just saying. You don’t have any body hair, you just lost half a foot, and you don’t even have a…” Aaron said until James interrupted him before he could go any further.

Needless to say, breakfast was eaten in silence. James didn't want to hear another word from Aaron about what was happening to him. Although, what Aaron was implying was on James' mind. As much as he hated it, he began to wonder if it was true.

This would be a weird day indeed.
1112111.title: Another Change

11121111.content:
James walked back to his room and closed the door, it was time for his usual morning shower, finally a chance to calm down and think things through. Of course, his current situation was hardly something normal.

Normal people don't just lose their manhood and body hair overnight.

As James considered this, he closed the door behind him and stripped out of his sleep clothes. After that, he quickly got the warm water running and stepped into the shower. The water managed to somewhat calm his nerves allowing him to think about a few things.

Did someone put estrogen pills in his drinks or something? No, probably not. That could explain the skin and lack of body hair, but no pill could give him a woman's reproductive system. That would be more like magic

"But is that even possible?" wondered James as he grabbed the bar soap and began washing his now smooth body. He slightly winced, as his skin seemed to be a bit more sensitive now. He sighed and continued onward.

"I wonder if....UGH!" grunted James as a fierce feeling invaded his face, making him drop the soap and lean against the shower wall.

A somewhat burning sensation spread through his face. Not enough to make him scream, but enough for wince in slight pain. James couldn't tell what was going on, but it felt like his cheekbones were rearranging, forming higher on his face. As his lips were together, he felt as if they were puffing up or something, like how he felt during the allergy season.

Next, the sensation spread across his jaw line, seemingly crunching it together and making it smaller and softer. The tissues in his nose seemed to shrink, suddenly is vision became temporarily blurry as though his eyes were changing shape. A tickling feeling came as James could feel something growing on his eyes, likely eyelashes. The same shrinking feeling also spread to his eyebrows, as he felt them become smaller too. Finally, a weird sensation went to his ears as he felt them shrink as well.

"What the?" said James as he quickly paused the shower and grabbed a towel for the moment. He ran over to the mirror, looking in horror as the face of a rather beautiful woman looked back at him.

"Oh god!" was all he could think of before getting the rest of his shower over with.
11121111.title: James takes a shower

111211111.content:
He couldn’t believe it, on top of all the random physically impossible changes that he had already gone through now he was cute too! And to make things worse Aaron was right, there was no denying it now, he was turning into a girl.

He steps out of the bathroom to escape the sight of his new face in the mirror. Unfortunately for him he finds himself in front of his closet mirror as he feels another change coming on. He was frozen in place with his eyes fixed on the mirror to see his towel fall to the ground revealing his entire body.

His eyes were first drawn to his hips as they began to expand while his waist began to shrink along with his stomach. Next his back naturally arched forcing his chest it began to expand as well into perky C cups. He didn’t know what to do or say as before his eyes he became more feminine with ever second. His new heavier breasts weighted his chest down forcing him to bend over, at which point he felt his thighs begin to tingle as they began to tone up. The feeling then spread to his butt which began to expand.

When it was finally over James was speechless, staring at his now naked completely female body in the mirror.

He then quickly snapped out of it and rummaged through his closet to try and find something to cover himself up. He tried to put on a pair of blue jeans but he couldn’t get them past his new butt. So he had no choice but to put on a pair of baggy sweatpants, which weren’t so baggy anymore with his new lower body. And since he was never one for oversized shirts, even his largest shirt fit him a little too tight around his new chest. But it was something.
111211111.title: Getting Dressed

1112111111.content:
James opens the door, takes a deep breath and quietly walks into the common area. If Aaron didn’t already know what was going on he would have been the last person that James would tell, but unfortunately he did so there was no use in hiding or pretending that he was some random girl.

Aaron was on the couch watching TV until he caught a glimpse of James out of the corner of his eye. His jaw then dropped and he started smiling uncontrollably.

“No way… James is that really you in there.” he says getting up to get a closer look at him.

“Yeah… it’s me…” James says quickly crossing his arms over his chest when he noticed Aaron staring at it. Which just made Aaron laugh, “This is incredible, everything is different, even your Adam’s apple is gone.” He says

“Oh yeah that’s what convinces you, as though I’d done everything else with makeup.” He says sarcastically

“Oh come on you know what I mean,” he says continuously looking him over, “I’ve got to admit you turned out pretty hot.” Aaron says checking out his butt.

“Gee thanks…” He says, “So do you think it’s permanent?” Aaron asks smiling

A chill runs down James’ spin as he turns around and exclaims, “Oh god! I hope not!”

“Yeah I guess we will just have to wait and see, but you know, until then you don’t have a driver’s license, a bank account, or anything really.” Aaron says smiling

“Oh no that’s right, what am I going to do.” James says sitting down on the couch, Aaron then walks over and sits down beside him.

“Don’t worry buddy, you’ve still got me.” He says uncharacteristically, “You can just stay here until all this blows over.” He says smiling

James doesn’t buy this for a minute, “Ah... thanks man…” he says

“Of course what are friends for… Speaking of which if you’re going to just be hanging around here why don’t we find you something more… comfortable to wear.” He says smiling devilishly

“I knew it!” James says jumping up off the couch and turning around, all to Aarons delight as he watched James’ breasts giggle without a bra. James then crosses his arms and turns bright red.

“There is no way I’m going to parade around here in some skimpy outfit for your amusement!” he says out of frustration

Aaron then stands up, continuing to smile, “Yeah I’m sorry what was I thinking, we should take you to the hospital ASAP,” he says, “Then again if we go to the hospital and word gets around that a guy mysteriously turned into a woman, every reporter in the city will want to see for themselves, you’ll be a real celebrity.” He says smiling,

“No! No one can know about this.” James says, “Well that’s just a chance were going to have to take, so I’ll just make a call and when I tell them I’m sure they will send an ambulance.” Aaron says

“No!” James says, Aaron then picks up the phone, “No one will believe you.” He says desperately, “Oh I’m sure they would take their chances when I tell them you don’t exist in any known database.” He says

James then goes silent, “Okay so here is how it’s going to work, I’m going to go shopping, and whatever I bring back, you’re going to wear. You are also going to cook and clean and do whatever else I say.” He says smiling

James then quietly nods his head in defeat as he walks back to his room.

Suddenly the power goes out and Aaron hears a knock on the door
1112111111.title: Face Aaron

choices: He turns into a little girl
James comes to see what all the yelling was about
11121111111.content:
Suddenly the power goes out.

“What tha?” Aaron says looking outside to see that there isn’t a cloud in the sky.

Just then there is a knock on the door, Aaron then walks to the door and looks through the peep hole to see a kindly old man with toolbox.

“Maintenance.” The man says smiling

Aaron thinks it is a little strange how he showed up so fast but he decides to let him in anyway.

“Hey there young fellow, Is everything alright here?” he asks smiling, “Ah no, the power just randomly shut off.” Aaron says

“Alright then, just let me take a look and we will have things back on track in no time.” The man says walking towards the breaker box.

“So ah what happened to Frank?” Aaron asks the man, “Frank?” the man asks, “Yeah the usual handy man for this floor.” Aaron says, “Oh yeah, he ah… called in sick today.” The man says

“You know I think I met you roommate the other day, I think he said his name was, James right?” the man asks continuing to work

“Ah yeah tall, skinny, kind of quiet?” Aaron says, “Yeah that’s the guy, had a nice talk with him. Is he around here?” the man asks

“No, family emergency left town.” He says, “Oh no I hope everything is okay.” The man says

“Don’t worry I don’t think it’s anything serious.” Aaron says

“Yeah I hope not, James seems like a good guy, if only he had a little confidence.” The man says, Aaron was a little confused as to why this random maintenance man is talking about.

“Ah yeah but he has always been that way.” Aaron says, “Has he? Or maybe putting up with you is making it impossible for him to work up any confidence.” He man say closing the breaker box and turning around.

“What are you talking about?” Aaron says a little caught off guard by the comment.

“I know all about you Aaron, and I can forgive your many character flaws but the way that you crush James’ spirit on a daily basis is unforgivable.” He says

“Hey who do you think you are?! Get the hell out!” Aaron says pointing to the door, but the old man just smiles

Suddenly...
11121111111.title: Continue

111211111111.content:
Suddenly Aaron feels a strange tingling sensation shooting through his body, the room then starts spinning as he falls to the floor. Moments later he finds himself looking up at the hold man. As he stands up he notices that his clothes are now far too big. His pajama pants have already fallen off of him leaving with nothing but an extra large shirt which now covers him past his knees.

“What the hell?!” he says instants noticing that his voice had changed.

He then steps out of his pile of clothes and runs to the window to find a cut little girl wearing nothing but a t-shirt staring back at him.

Aaron then screams as loud as he can, turning around to exclaim, “What did you do to me!?”

Suddenly James bursts into the room to find the old man and a small female Aaron.

“Wow hey what’s going on?!” James says first noticing the old man, “Hey it’s you.” He says then looking over to the window to see a cute little girl wearing Aarons favorite shirt.

“You know him!” Aaron exclaims, “Wait what is going on here?” James asks the old man not sure what a child is doing in the apartment.

“It’s me Aaron, and I think we found out how you turned into a woman.” Aaron says angrily looking at the old man

“You did this, but why?” James asks still shocked that all this was actually happening

“Well you see…” the man tried to say before he was interrupted by a furious Aaron, “Who cares why, change me back!” Aaron exclaims, “Calm down, and ill…” he tries to say only to be interrupted again, “There is no way in…” Aaron rants until the man snaps his fingers and a pacifier forced itself into Aaron’s mouth. Aaron quickly tires to remove it but is unable to. But while he tries the old man continues with what he was saying

“As I was saying, after our talk the other day I could instantly tell that you are a good person and all you need is confidence. So I decided to give you a change of perspective. But I know see the true root of your problems.” he says looking at Aaron as he tries to remove the pacifier

“Him?” James asks, “Yes, whether or not you want to admit it he crushes your spirit on a daily basis and after his blackmail attempt this morning I think he needs to be taught a lesson.” The man says walking over to Aaron.

Aaron then stops trying to remove the pacifier and looks at the old man, “You are spoiled, insensitive, and lazy. But it is understandable, you have been treated like royalty your whole life because of your looks. So I think you too need a change of perspective. You are now 5 years old, and James is now your legal guardian.” He says smiling

And with that Aarons eyes widen with fear as he throws a fit.

“Wait I don’t know if I…” James tries to say, “Don’t worry, you already clean up after him like his mother, only thing is now you are officially in charge.” The old man says smiling

“Now I’ll be looking in on yall from time to time and all of the paper work yall need, driver’s license, bank information, everything is on the kitchen table, have fun.” The old man says walking out the front door

As the man closes the door Aarons pacifier disappears, and he quickly runs to the door to try and catch the man. But when he opens the door he was gone.
111211111111.title: Aaron turns into a little girl

1112111111111.content:
Aaron rushes out into the hallway; running to both ends of the hallway but the man was gone.

He then walks back into the apartment saying, “I don’t get it he must have started sprinting the second the door closed.”

“Or maybe he just disappeared.” James says while looking at the paperwork that the man mentioned.

“Why are you so calm? Look at us!” Aaron says gesturing to his favorite shirt that he now wore like a dress.

“Well honestly I feel a little bit better now.” He says putting the paperwork down and looking at Aaron.

“What! You feel better now that I can’t see PG-13 movies by myself anymore?!” he exclaims

“Hey Calm down Erin, yelling isn’t going to change anything.” James says,

“Wait, what did you call me?” he asks, “Erin, that’s your name now. See look it’s all here.” He says handing him a sheet of paper.

He then takes the paper and sees a birth certificate for an Erin Thompson. “Oh wow you’ve got to be kidding me.” He says, “And here’s mine,” James says showing him a birth certificate and a drivers license, “I guess I’m Jamie Thomson now.”

“Wow Aaron to Erin and James to Jamie, Mr. Magic man shore is creative.” He says sarcastically before remembering how crazy this all was, “But that’s beside the point! And exactly what part of all this makes you feel better?” he asks

“Well this morning I thought this was some kind of horrible nightmare, but now I see that in a weird way this is a gift, not a curse.” He says looking down at his new form,

“Gift? Speak for yourself” he says looking down at his new form, “Yeah okay maybe in your case its more tough love but still think about what he was saying about a new perspective.” He says

“Look there was nothing wrong with my perspective; I was actually enjoying my perspective.” He says pouting

“Yeah I’m sure you were.” He says thinking back to how he took advantage of his old perspective.

“And hey, now that I have a driver’s license and my bank account has been switched over I don’t need you to go buy me clothe.” He says with a grin.
1112111111111.title: Continue

11121111111111.content:
"Fantastic, meanwhile I do need clothes now that I'm a goddamn 5 year old girl!" Aaron squealed. "Well..." A knock on the door interrupted them. "Maybe that magic a****** came back!" expressed Aaron, hopefully.

"You're 5, don't talk like that Erin!" remonstrated James as he went to the door. An attractive woman answered the door. "Hi!" stated James, nervously. This girl was really pretty. "Wow! I mean...hi! I mean I thought that James and his awful roommate Aaron lived here!" she stated.

James spoke quickly to cut off Aaron. "No, its just me Jamie Thompson and my daughter Erin!" "Oh and is there a Mr Thompson?" "NO! I mean...no!" James managed to reply.

"I'm Sandy Johnson, pleased to meet you!" she answered. "Pleased to meet you too! Would you like to come in?" you offer. "I would love to!" she replied, entering the door. Aaron is about to talk but James put the pacifier on and turned on the television. To his amazement, Aaron fell into watching it.

"She is as beautiful as her mother!" exclaimed Sandy, taking James' hand. You blush, thanking her. "So how long have you been living here?" she asked. "Oh...we moved in a while ago!" you stammer. How could you convince this girl to like you? You lean closer to her and she beams at you.

"So how does a beautiful single mother manage to do it all? I hope I'm not rude in asking." she inquired. "Well, Erin is a handful, but we have been okay." you reply. "You are incredible to raise a child on your own. You have my deepest admiration!" she stated. "Thank you!" you whisper.

You were caught unawares as she kissed you. You quickly kiss her back, feeling her soft lips against you. You silently thank the magic man for his gift. She breaks away, blushing. You take a moment to check on Erin, before taking her hand. "We have to be quiet!" you whisper.
11121111111111.title: Continue

111211111111111.content:
It's been 3 weeks since James became Jamie Thompson, sexy single lesbian mother. In those 3 weeks, Jamie had become involved romantically with Sandy Johnson, one of her sexy neighbours. Meanwhile, Aaron was stuck at home, pouting as her new babysitter talk on her Smartphone. She hated being treated like a child by the college student Jill Bixby. Jill looked like Laurie Prange from the Incredible Hulk. Jamie entered her apartment with a grin.

Jill beamed at Jamie as she waved to the babysitter. "So how was work?" she asked. "Fantastic! Sandy and I got the proposal before the boss and we both got a raise! And she finally decided! She is moving in with us!" exclaimed Jamie with a grin. Erin frowned, watching the stupid Dora the Explorer. She hated the show, yet she could not turn herself away from the screen. "And how were the two of you? Was Erin a good girl?" asked Jamie. Erin managed to tear herself from the TV to glare at her mother.

"She was good as gold! She did some colouring in, ate her afternoon tea and watched Dora!" revealed Jill. Erin pouted as she turned back to the television. It was torture for her, being babysat by this beautiful woman. Every time, Erin would deliberately drop a crayon, Jill would bend over to pick it up. As she stared at Jill’s cut-off shorts, she thought of all the hot girls she had been with back when she was a man. A particularly terrible thought struck her. What if she never became a man again?

It was all good and gravy for Jamie who was getting laid regularly. Jamie also had a new awesome, high paying job. Meanwhile Erin was stuck going to bloody kindergarten! She considered trying to prove her intelligence, but she never paid attention in school when she was a boy, so she was unable to do her timetables. So she remained stuck as a child. "Here, take this for a job well done!" offered Jamie. Jill's eyes grew wide as she looked at the money she had just been given. “Ms Thompson…this is way too much! I can’t accept $200!” she confessed.

Jamie pushed her hand back, refusing to take it back. “I know my little girl. You deserve every penny. When are you available next?” she asked. “Well I can come back tomorrow! Thanks again, Ms Thompson!” declared Jill as she left. “So Sandy’s moving in, is she? Great, I have to pretend to be a little kid full time now!” pouted Erin. “Erin, you are a little girl! Besides I got you some chocolate cookies, your favourites!” remarked Jamie.

Erin suddenly threw down the remote. “I can’t take it anymore! You get a great job, body and girlfriend! Meanwhile I’m stuck as a little girl! I’m a man! I want to be a man again! Please help me, James!” she screamed, tears running down her face. Jamie ran up to her, patting her on the back. Erin calmed down, relaxing against her new mother’s chest. Jamie gently put her back on the couch, handing her a cookie. “We have to make the best of our new perspectives, remember?” she pointed out.

“But my perspective sucks! And…” “Young lady, you will apologise this minute! I will not have you using such language!” interrupted Jamie, her eyes fierce. “Sorry!” responded Erin, hating these “Mom” moments. “Sorry what, young lady?” enquired Jamie, firmly. “Sorry, Mummy!” answered Erin, loathing those moments. “It’s 6 pm! That means it’s time for bed! Do you need me to dress you?” asked Jamie. Erin shook her head, stating “No thank you, Mummy!” “Ok, get dressed, brush your teeth, then I will read you a bed time story in bed!” declared Jamie.

“Yes, Mummy! Thank you Mummy!” answered Erin, politely. She knew better than to misbehave. Last time she did, Jamie made boiled Brussels sprouts, broccoli and peas for dinner and no dessert. She was also denied the chance to go see Ant-Man on opening night. She saw it the next week. She put on her pyjamas, hating how cute it looked. She was a young man in her twenties.

But looking at herself in the bathroom mirror, she only saw a child. In the space of 3 weeks, she had gone from a cool guy who had many girls to a little 5 year old with bedtime and picking up after herself. If Jamie hadn’t bought her a Play station, she thought she would go mad. The apartment was spotless now; and Erin knew that Jamie didn't want to go back to being James again. She finished brushing her teeth and made her way to her bed where Jamie was waiting.

All thoughts left her as she heard the story of Cinderella. Perhaps, just perhaps, she deserved this terrible punishment. She contemplated how much she was like the ugly stepsisters, mistreating James/Cinderella. She closed her eyes and the world was gone.
111211111111111.title: 3 Weeks Later

1112111111111112.content:
"Hey, you need to wake up!" came a loud voice. Aaron wakes up, groggily. He looked up to see a policewoman glaring at him. "W-what?" Aaron managed to stammer, a loud ringing in his ears. His head felt like it was under assault. "You better leave, sir! We don't allow people to sleep on park benches, here!" she declared. "W-what? S-Sorry what are you talk...Wait did...did you call me, sir?" he asked excitedly.

"Do you prefer, man?" she retorted. "I'm a sir! I'm a man! I'm not a little girl anymore!" he exclaimed, before clutching his head again. "I think you should leave, sir!" she warned him. He nodded, thanking the policewoman. He looked down at himself, he was dressed in his shirt and jeans. He ran over to the lake and looked it. It was clear and he saw he was himself again. "YES! I'm free! In your face, magic man!" he declared, running at full pelt.

He found himself back at his apartment building, ringing the doorbell confidently. "Yes, who is this?" came a man's voice he did not recognise. "Sorry, sir, I was ringing for Jamie Thompson!" he explained. "Well this was her apartment, but she and her daughter moved in with her girlfriend 2 weeks ago!" he revealed. "2 weeks ago? Sorry, where is she now?" he asked. "Sorry, they left no forwarding address. Good luck finding them!" he said, hanging up.

Aaron was stunned. James was still a lesbian single mother. And he or rather she still had a daughter. What was going on? "Confused, Aaron?" Aaron spun around to see the mysterious old man again. "Where's James?" he demanded. "He is enjoying his new life as Jamie Thompson-Johnson. They flew to Boston to marry one week ago. It took 5 weeks, but James got the life she deserved. And you Aaron now have the life you deserve!" the old man stated, before changing.

A young woman appeared before Aaron. "Who or what are you?" he cried. "Erin Grant, a powerful witch. I was a born a worthless man called Aaron Grant before I ascended to the superior gender. Since you wanted to live as an inferior, consider your wish granted! Now you are Aaron Taylor, homeless and jobless! Good luck fending for yourself for a change. Enjoy your new perspective!" she finished with a sneer. She disappeared before his eyes, leaving him alone.

Aaron looked into his pockets. He only had a wallet; no phone, no passport, no keys. Inside his wallet was ten dollars and a driver's licence. He checked it and the address given was his old family home. His parents had moved to California, 2 months ago. His heart fell as he realised his predicament. He had no money, home or job! Jamie and his parents weren't there to take care of him. He needed to find a homeless shelter! He cursed his luck as he walked the streets of the town.
1112111111111112.title: Continue

info.brief_description: Two very different people learn valuable lessons from a new perspective on life.
info.description:
Now it is generally understood that physical appearance has a lot to do with the kind of people we grow up to be. It affects the way people treat us as well as the way we see ourselves, whether we become confident or arrogant, sociable or shy.

This story is about two very different people who are somehow transformed so that they can get a different perspective on life and themselves. So itâs kind of like a transformation freaky Friday. But donât let the serious talk discourage you, make things interesting because this is learning a lesson the hard way.

Right now Iâm not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
